summary: A full retexture of all the elven equipment...
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:
------------------

This is a full retexture of all the elven equipment, trying to make it evoke ancient egypt in some details.

-Texture size for all pieces has been doubled and improved (1024x1024, 2048x2048 for the cuirass)
-New normal and reflection maps.
-Male and Female armor included.
-All weapons, shield, scabbard, quiver and arrows also included.
-Minor fixes from previously released versions of the armor and greatsword.

*Added a vanilla resolution pack as well for those who desire*

Note that it replaces vanilla elven stuff until CK comes out.


INSTALLATION:
-------------------

Copy the data folder to your Skyrim directory.
 To uninstall delete all the files located at (Skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven) and (Skyrim/data/textures/weapons/elven).
author: Hairon
